name: Academic_Workspace_Project
observations: Transform GitHub and VS Code into comprehensive academic ecosystem
Designed for BS IT Network & Cybersecurity TERM-3 SY-2024-25
Covers 5 courses with AI-optimized structure
Includes automation, privacy compliance, and portfolio development
Foundation phase completed June 3, 2025

name: MO-IT103
observations: Computer Programming 2
Focus on advanced programming concepts
Includes web applications and database integration
Portfolio items: Full-stack projects and technical documentation

name: MO-IT143
observations: Ethical Hacking
Focus on penetration testing and vulnerability assessment
Includes security audits and penetration testing labs
Portfolio items: Security assessments and ethical hacking demonstrations

name: MO-IT147
observations: Information Assurance and Security 1
Focus on risk assessment and security policies
Includes compliance frameworks and policy development
Portfolio items: Security frameworks and risk assessments

name: MO-IT148
observations: Applications Development and Emerging Technologies
Focus on modern frameworks and emerging tech integration
Includes mobile apps, cloud solutions, AI/ML integration
Portfolio items: Innovative applications and technology integrations

name: MO-IT151
observations: Platform Technologies
Focus on cloud platforms and infrastructure
Includes DevOps and deployment strategies
Portfolio items: Cloud architectures and automation scripts

name: GitHub_Actions_Automation
observations: 5 automated workflows designed
Weekly task generator for all courses
Project board management with status updates
Portfolio auto-update system
Feedback collection automation

name: Privacy_Solution
observations: Git submodules approach for private/public separation
Public repository for portfolio and collaboration
Private repository for academic materials
Full school regulation compliance

name: Feedback_Collection_System
observations: Multi-channel approach with GitHub Issues
GitHub Discussions for community feedback
Google Forms integration for external input
LinkedIn recommendation workflows
Systematic testimonial collection

name: Copilot_Instructions
observations: Comprehensive AI behavior standards defined
Project context and academic program details included
File organization and documentation conventions specified
MCP memory management integration included

name: Student_User
observations: BS IT Network & Cybersecurity student
TERM-3 SY-2024-25 academic period
Uses MCP tools: memory, github, filesystem
